entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
